title: Mexican braised pork
ingredients: ['oil for frying', '1kg boneless pork shoulder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon pepper', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground adobo seasoning', '1 bulb garlic, peeled and coarsely chopped', '250ml beef stock', '2 bay leaves', '3 chipotle chillies']
